description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Chilli Bbq Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ chicken,Quick & easy dinner,Roast,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken
name: Sweet Chilli Bbq Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sauces together. Add garlic and lime juice and whisk well. Pour into a shallow bowl.
Cut 2 slashes into each chicken thigh. Add to marinade and turn to coat chicken well in mixture. Marinate for 2 hours, or overnight if time permits.

Heat a barbecue or chargrill over medium heat. Remove chicken from marinade and wipe off excess. Place chicken, skin-side down, on barbecue and turn off burner directly below it. Cover with lid or roasting pan and cook for 5 minutes, then turn over and cook for another 5 minutes. Repeat process once more, cooking chicken for a further 10 minutes. Turn more regularly if chicken is starting to burn.
